ValidationRule.description: When the Target_Metric__c picklist = “Booked Seats”, both Seat_Target__c (lookup) and Week_Number__c (number) must be populated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Target_Metric__c, "Booked Seats"), OR( ISBLANK(Target__c), ISBLANK(Week_Number__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: “You must select a Seat Target and enter a Week Number when Metric = Booked Seats.”
